data.text: @JonScoff F*** sake that is incredibly selfish
@ElBrethers One of the teenagers I work with got it and was off for a fortnight. He was seen at the match twice during that time 🙄
@JonScoff Madness mate. There will be inevitably be people out there knowingly spreading it without any care
@ElBrethers Erm... I was out in town Saturday as well. Both me and my brother joked about it being a real test of our vaccines. 🙄
@JonScoff Fear you're right mate. We caught it via the missus having a night out in town Saturday and bringing it home.
@ElBrethers Me and two of my workmates are all off with it and caught it at the same time. This isn't going nowhere any time soon.

@JonScoff Yeah mate it was horrific when it happened. We all had it at the same time but different symptoms. He left behind 2 young girls. Symptoms this time are wildly different. I fear it will get worse and people will die but the government will skew the figures
@ElBrethers Ah mate. Really sorry to hear that. It must have been awful for you all.
@JonScoff I've been working from home. Come 4 today I started getting the shakes and really bad aching in my joints. Had me thinking if this is what my uncle endured before he died of covid 😥
